title: Mcp-Clickhouse
description: An MCP server designed for executing SQL queries, listing databases, and listing tables on a ClickHouse cluster.
creator: iskakaushik

CLICKHOUSE_HOST.description: The host address of the ClickHouse server.

CLICKHOUSE_PORT.description: The port for connecting to the ClickHouse server.

CLICKHOUSE_USER.description: The username for authenticating with ClickHouse.

CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD.description: The password for authenticating with ClickHouse.

ENV_FILE_PATH.description: Path to the .env file containing configuration for the server.
